    IJob<T>, IRunner<T>, java.lang.Comparable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable

    public class LongRunningJob<T>
extends AbstractJob<T>
implements IRunner<T>
    Job that wraps the functionality of a LongRunningMethod.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter
